Package com.taursys.xml

This package contains the core Mapper XML components and containers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DocumentComponent A Document Component is a type of Component which binds to the Document.
 

Class Summary
AbstractField A Component which receives input and/or renders value to a Document.
Button Button is a visible Trigger
CheckboxField CheckboxField is a component which inputs and renders a selected state.
Component Component is foundation object for Mapper XML Components.
ComponentFactory UNDER CONSTRUCTION: ComponentFactory is used to automate the creation of Components based on the XML Document and its Elements.
Container Abstract Container for Mapper XML Components.
DocumentElement DocumentElement is a simple container element for an XML document.
Parameter A Component which receives parameters.
ParameterBeanInfo Title: Mapper XML Description: Sub-project for Mapper XML support without using XMLC Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: Taurus Systems
SelectField A Component which receives selection input and/or renders selected value to a Document.
SelectFieldBeanInfo Title: Mapper XML Description: Sub-project for Mapper XML support without using XMLC Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: Taurus Systems
Template A Template is a component used to display multiple items.
TextField A Component which receives input and/or renders text value to a Document.
Trigger A Component which responds to TriggerEvents.
 

Package com.taursys.xml Description

This package contains the core Mapper XML components and containers. These components are used to build web and XML presenation applications. These components function much as their Swing counterparts.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
